description: This Java source file defines a centralized exception handler for a Spring Boot REST application, managing various exception types and returning ProblemDetail responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A controller advice class that handles specific exceptions globally in a Spring Boot REST application.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException, returning a 404 ProblemDetail with resource info.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors, returning a 400 ProblemDetail with validation error details.

methods.name: handleErrorResponseException
methods.description: Handles ErrorResponseException, extracting and returning its body as ProblemDetail.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 Internal Server Error ProblemDetail.
